summary: This bill, the "Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2025," seeks to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act. It mandates the implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols (MPP), also known as "Remain in Mexico," by changing the language from "may" to "shall" in section 235(b)(2)(C). This act forces the enforcement of MPP and is sponsored by several Senators.
